name: react-redux-sandbox
description: sandbox testing some react and redux stuff

scripts.clean: npm run clean-build & npm run clean-dist & npm run clean-sites
scripts.clean-sites: npm run clean-cover & npm run clean-tsdoc
scripts.cover: npm run test && npm run remap-istanbul-json && npm run remap-istanbul-html
scripts.csslint: cat src/components/*.css src/*.css > dist/app.css && csslint --config=.csslintrc --format=compact dist/app.css
scripts.dist: browserify src/app.tsx --debug --standalone app -p [ tsify --project . ] > build/app-with-source-maps.js && npm run csslint
scripts.everything: npm run tsdoc && npm run cover
scripts.lint: npm run tslint && npm run jshint && npm run jslint && npm run csslint
scripts.postdist: npm run exorcist && npm run uglifyjs && npm run uglifycss
scripts.precover: trash docs/sites/coverage/ && npm run jslint && npm run jshint && npm run dist
scripts.predist: trash build/ && mkdirp build && trash dist/ && mkdirp dist && npm run tslint && npm run csslint
scripts.preversion: npm run purge && npm install && npm run everything
scripts.purge: npm run clean & npm run clean-downloaded
scripts.uglifyjs: uglifyjs dist/app.js --output dist/app.min.js --source-map dist/app.min.js.map --screw-ie8 --in-source-map dist/app.js.map --source-map-url app.min.js.map

author: Jurriaan H. Spaaks
